en: I get up at seven o'clock.
Do you do your homework in the afternoon?
I brush my teeth in the morning.
She goes to school at eight o'clock.
sk: Ona chodí do školy o ôsmej.

en: We play football at the weekend.
There's a supermarket in my town.
Is there a cinema in your street?
The hospital is next to the post office.
The teacher is in the classroom.
What time do you go to bed?
She likes Art, but she doesn't like Maths.
sk: Má rada výtvarnú, ale nemá rada matematiku.

en: I usually have lunch at school.
They always do their homework in the evening.
sk: Oni si vždy robia úlohy večer.

en: Do you go to bed late?
Can I see the menu, please?
Can I have it without onions?
Can I have a small / medium / large?
sk: Môžem si dať malé / stredné / veľké?

en: Can I have the bill, please?
Can I have a cheeseburger, please?
Can I have a meal, please?
With fries and a drink, please.
Can I have sweet and sour sauce?
How many nuggets would you like?
August is the last month of summer.
The red car is bigger than the blue car.
sk: Červené auto je väčšie ako modré auto.

en: The red car is faster than the green car.
sk: Červené auto je rýchlejšie ako zelené auto.

en: The blue car is slower than the red car.
sk: Modré auto je pomalšie ako červené auto.

en: The giraffe is taller than the zebra.
The goat is smaller than the horse.
Russia is bigger than the UK.
sk: Rusko je väčšie ako Spojené kráľovstvo.

en: The highest mountain is Mount Everest.
sk: Najvyššia hora sveta je Mount Everest.

en: The fastest animal is the cheetah.
What's the biggest country in the world?
sk: Aká je najväčšia krajina na svete?

en: They find a hole in the wall.
I get up at seven o'clock.
He has a shower every morning.
I have breakfast with my family.
She brushes her teeth every morning.
We catch the bus to school.
What time do you start school?
He never goes to the shopping mall.
We get up at eight o'clock.
Can we turn on the television?
Can you open the window, please?
Can you help me with my homework?
The monkey is taking your sandwich!
You must turn off your mobile phone.
You mustn't walk on the grass.
You must be quiet in the library.
You mustn't eat in the classroom.
You must listen to the teacher.
You mustn't run in the corridor.
There was a park in our town.
There were some trains a hundred years ago.
I wasn't tall when I was five.
sk: Nebol som vysoký, keď som mal päť.

en: I had a maths lesson last week.
sk: Minulý týždeň som mal hodinu matematiky.

en: Did you have a good day?
What did you watch last night?
He's going to play basketball tomorrow.
Are you going to swim in the sea?
She isn't going to watch TV.
I'm going to read a book.
